de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds

Class HarmonicBondChunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds.HarmonicBondChunk

  • public class HarmonicBondChunk
extends java.lang.Object
    Harmonic bond chunk where a particle index of all harmonic bonds occurs only ONCE in the chunk
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny
